Plintissa sighed and realized that Iron Raptor was rihgt......she came from
the flower garden and up into the base.... "where did you get that weapon?"
she said, noticing the energy signature was different on Iron Raptor because
she had some BIG weapon......Plintissa then knew how she could win battles,
she needed some weaponary!......she awaited an answer......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 8:46 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
> * Iron Raptor snarled and shook her head as she walked towards the
weapon's
> hold, why Plintissa valued herself so lightly was beyond her. She turned a
> corner in the hall and walked towards the door that entered into the
weapons
> room, she had fought alongside that fembot almost from the beginning and
she
> thought that she did just fine.
> Iron Raptor entered into the room and looked over the racks and piles of
> weapons, she lifted a semi-automatic flame thrower and looked it over. It
> was a good weapon but not the one in which she was looking for, she set it
> down and lifted up a duel-shock missal launcher. She hefted it and felt
it's
> weight, it fit her perfectly.
> Iron Raptor smiled and put the launcher away in one of her back
> compartments, now it was time to get to the island's borders.
> She snarled, this battle may be a tough battle and they would need all of
> the bot's they could get. This was no time to let Plintissa run off!
> Iron Raptor opened her comlink to Plintissa's frequencies she exited the
> room and headed for the bridge...*
>
> " Iron Raptor to Plintissa, come in. It's about time that you returned to
> base, there's been the orders to head to the island's borders and prepare
to
> be attacked. I want you there as well. Iron Raptor out."
>
> * She hoped that Plintissa would change her mind and fight this battle
with
> them, but she didn't have to much time to waste on that matter when a
battle
> threatened. After all, it was up to Plintissa, not her.*
>
